core:messageResource.core:message: Post Void
No appropriate Post Transaction Void reason codes are available.
Please select a transaction for Post Void.
Post Void
Cannot post void an already post voided transaction.
Cannot post void a post void transaction.
Cannot reverse this type of transaction.
Cannot reverse this transaction because it was not done in training mode.
Cannot reverse this transaction because it was done in training mode.
There are items in the transaction that prevent it from been reversed.
The transaction was completed outside the time limit. Press OK to continue.
The transaction was completed outside the time limit. Authorisation required.
The transaction was completed outside the days limit. Press OK to continue.
The transaction was completed outside the days limit. Authorisation required.
The transaction was completed on a different terminal. Press OK to continue.
The transaction was completed on a different terminal. Authorisation required.
The transaction value is over the transaction value limit. Press OK to continue.
The transaction value is over the transaction value limit. Authorisation required.
The transaction item count is over the item count limit. Press OK to continue.
The transaction item count is over the item count limit. Authorisation required.
Please press OK to confirm Post Void of Refund Transaction.
Authorisation required for Post Void of Refund Transaction.
The reason is not a reversal reason.
Failed to create reversal transaction.
Failed to create reversal basket item.
Failed to add post void item to the basket.
Please confirm post transaction void or press cancel to return.
The transaction was voided by transaction void and cannot be post voided.
Cannot post void a repair amendment transaction.
Cannot post void a no sale transaction.
The selected transaction was post voided successfully but the creation of tender correction transaction failed.
Select
Select
You cannot Post Transaction Void a transaction you have started yourself.
You cannot Post Transaction Void a transaction you have tendered yourself.
You cannot Post Transaction Void an employee transaction created for you.
Please enter the post transaction void {%=(empty(fieldValidatorName) ? 'reference number' : fieldValidatorName)}.
Invalid post transaction void reference number.
Invalid transaction ID.
The transaction was completed in a different location. Press OK to continue.
The transaction was completed before last day end. Press OK to continue.
The transaction was completed before last day end. Authorisation required.
Failed to access service for last day end.
Post Transaction Void Allowed
Post transaction voids are allowed
Authorises Post Transaction Void
The user can authorise post transaction voids
Authorises Reversal Beyond Time Limit
The user can authorise reversal beyond time limit
Authorises Reversal Beyond Days Limit
The user can authorise reversal beyond days limit
Authorises Reversal at Different Terminal
The user can authorise reversal at different terminal
Authorises Reversal of Refund Transactions
The user can authorise reversal of refund transactions
Authorises Reversal Over Value Limit
The user can authorise reversal of transactions over the transaction value limit
Authorises Reversal Over Item Count Limit
The user can authorise reversal of transactions over the item count limit
Tender Correction Allowed
Tender corrections are allowed
Authorises Tender Correction
The user can authorise tender corrections
The user can Post Transaction Void a transaction started by the user
Allow Post Void of Transaction Started by the User
The user can authorise the Post Transaction Void of a transaction started by the same user
Authorise Post Void of Transaction Started by the Same User
The user can Post Transaction Void a transaction tendered by the user
Allow Post Void of Transaction Tendered by the user
The user can authorise the Post Transaction Void of a transaction tendered by the same user
Authorise Post Void of Transaction Tendered by the Same User
The user can Post Transaction Void an employee transaction created for the user
Allow Post Void of Employee Transaction for the user
The user can authorise the Post Transaction Void of an employee transaction for the same user
Authorise Post Void of Employee Transaction for the Same User
Manual Post Transaction Void Allowed
Manual post transaction voids are allowed
Authorises Manual Post Transaction Void
The user can authorise manual post transaction voids
Transaction From This Location Only
The user can only do reversal for transactions that are completed in the location which the user is in
Authorises Reversal Before Last Day End
The user can authorise reversal before last day end
